name: ComprehensiveMetabolicPanelCMP
title: Comprehensive Metabolic Panel (CMP)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable panel codes for Comprehensive Metabolic Panel (CMP).),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood, serum, or plasma for a Comprehensive Metabolic Panel (CMP).),(Inclusion Criteria: Comprehensive Metabolic Panel (CMP) lab test, using the source of blood, serum, or plasma, coded in LOINC, using panel codes. LOINC will need to be referenced for the individual laboratory observations associated with these panel code(s).),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include any codes or concepts which do not represent a Comprehensive Metabolic Panel (CMP) as defined in the inclusion criteria.)

concept.display: Comprehensive metabolic 1998 panel - Serum or Plasma
Comprehensive metabolic 2000 panel - Serum or Plasma

contains.display: Comprehensive metabolic 1998 panel - Serum or Plasma
Comprehensive metabolic 2000 panel - Serum or Plasma
